What is the title of the TV show adapted from the 2019 Taylor Jenkins-Reid novel?
Daisy Jones & The Six
Which streaming platform premiered the show 'Daisy Jones & The Six'?
Amazon Prime
In which decade is the show 'Daisy Jones & The Six' set?
Which real-life band is the fictional band in the show inspired by?
Fleetwood Mac
Who are the lead singers of the fictional band in the show?
Billy Dunne and Daisy Jones
Who plays the character Billy Dunne in the show?
Sam Claflin
Who plays the character Daisy Jones in the show?
Riley Keough
What is the storytelling format used in the show, which mimics the novel's structure?
Mockumentary
What is the name of the Fleetwood Mac album that the show's story is similar to?
Rumours
Who is the granddaughter of Elvis Presley and plays Daisy Jones in the show?
Riley Keough
